item.title: Report E-2024120463
item.description:
Report E-2024120463

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-01T21:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-28
  • City: GLENPOOL
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO in Glenpool, OK contacted ERTS regarding a leaking 300-gallon plastic tote containing IMAGE NO. 186 (Nitric Acid). A contractor dispatched and observed an estimated 2-CUPS of released product onto the wooden trailer in floor and the top of the tote itself in a 2'x2' area. The cap to the tote was defective causing the spill. The contractor neutralized the release using sodium bicarbonate and replaced the broken cap. One drum of waste was generated containing the impacted and neutralized PPE and absorbents. No storm-drains, waterways, or soil were involved in this incident.

item.title: Report E-2024120452
item.description:
Report E-2024120452

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-01T21:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-05
  • City: OKLAHOMA CITY
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 14:24 ET, XPO notified the Call Center of a cargo release at terminal LOO. It was reported that approximately 3 gallons of 0-degree windshield wash premix was released from one 55-gallon drum due to debris puncture. The release impacted Dock #73. The Call Center reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. Chemtrec has been notified, POC: Karen, Tracking #2024110500174. Two waste containers were created, 221559-1 contains leftover product and will be salvaged, and 221559-2 contains oil dri with absorbed product, which will be disposed of as waste.
